message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. We can always negotiate later.
You wanted a fair split, but I think I can do better than that. This is my opening offer.
You're pushing for a bigger share, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think this is the maximum I'm willing to give up.
You said you were willing to meet me halfway, but I think you can do a bit better than that. This is my revised offer.
I'm not willing to give up more than 55% of the remaining amount. Let's meet in the middle, Bob.
